General.Name: Optowide Technologies Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Optowide Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of precision optics and fiber components in China and internationally. The company's precision optics products include molded glass aspheric lenses, optical filters, plano optics, spherical optics, and other optics; and fiber components, such as telecom passive components, high power laser components, and other fiber components. Its products are used in fiber optics communication, fiber lasers, and other application fields, including quantum optics research, bio-med, consumer optics, and others. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Yi  Liu
1.Title: Director, Deputy GM, CFO & Board Sec.
